00052 
00053 // BUZZER Functions
00054 
00055 /*****Function to Initialize PORTS*****/
00056 void init_buzzer()
00057 {
00058  DDRC = DDRC | 0x08;    //Setting PORTC pin3 as outpt
00059  PORTC = 0x00;    //Initialize Values of PORTC to 0.
00060 }
00061 
00062 /***** Buzzer Delay Function*****/
00063 void buzzer_delay()
00064 {
00065  unsigned int i;
00066  for(i=0; i<10;i++)
00067  {
00068   _delay_us(100);
00069  }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BUZZER_ON()
00073 {
00074 
00075 int i=0; 
00076    unsigned char port_C_copy;
00077    port_C_copy = PORTC;
00078    port_C_copy = port_C_copy | 0x08;
00079    PORTC = port_C_copy; 
00080    //for(i=0;i<10;i++)
00081  //tick_timer();
00082  buzzer_delay();
00083    port_C_copy = PORTC;
00084    port_C_copy = port_C_copy & 0xF7;
00085    PORTC = port_C_copy; 
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 //PORTC = 0x08;   //Set pin3 to turn the "buzzer ON"
00090 //buzzer_delay();   //delay
00091 
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 void BUZZER_OFF()
00097 {
00098 
00099 PORTC = 0x00;   //Clear pin3 to turn the "buzzer OFF"
00100 buzzer_delay();   //delay
00101 
00102 }
